title: Addressing the Racial Wealth Gap, Cleaning Up Oceans (Podcast)
itunes:title: Addressing the Racial Wealth Gap, Cleaning Up Oceans (Podcast)
description:
Catarina Saraiva, Bloomberg News Federal Reserve and Economics Reporter and Dallas Bureau Chief, discusses the black-white wealth gap. Dr. Deborah Brosnan, Marine Scientist and President of Deborah Brosnan & Associates, talks about UN World Ocean Day. Bloomberg News Hedge Fund Reporter Hema Parmar discusses her Big Take story. And we Drive to the Close with Robert Stimpson, CIO of Oak Associates.

Hosted by Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
